text: "She Says" is the third single from singer/songwriter Howie Day's second full- length album, Stop All the World Now on July 26, 2005. This single is a revamped version from his debut album, Australia which released on November 1, 2000. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable" !Chart (2005) !Peak position |- |align="left"|Canadian Singles Chart |align="center"|19 |- |U.S. Billboard Adult Pop Songs |align="center"|6 |- |U.S. Billboard Pop 100 |align="center"|73 |- |U.S. Billboard Hot Adult Contemporary Tracks |align="center"|31 |- |U.S. Billboard Bubbling Under Hot 100 Singles |align="center"|3 |} ===Year-end charts=== {|class="wikitable" !Chart (2006) !Position |- |US Adult Top 40 (Billboard) | style="text-align:center;"|28 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2005 singles Category:Howie Day songs Category:Music videos directed by Darren Grant Category:Song recordings produced by Warren Huart Category:2005 songs Category:Epic Records singles
title: She Says (Howie Day song)
